column2: After monitoring the solution architecture for cost optimization, we found that we can scale down App Servers from (m6gd.16xlarge) to (t4g.2xlarge) instance type
In addition,  database instances were optimized from (db.r4.4xlarge) to  as (db.r4.4xlarge) was over-provisioned capacity well above the actual demand
Further budget reductions are possible with switching to database reserved isntances and  EC2 savings plans / reserved instances

column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
